name: List
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
List
description: File::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more files that match the request and this value should be passed to the next Gcloud::Storage::Bucket#files to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more files that match the request and this value should be passed to the next Gcloud::Storage::Bucket#files to continue.

methods.name: prefixes
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
List#prefixes
methods.description: The list of prefixes of objects matching-but-not-listed up to and including the requested delimiter.

methods.name: prefixes=
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
List#prefixes=
methods.description: The list of prefixes of objects matching-but-not-listed up to and including the requested delimiter.

methods.name: next?
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of files.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"
files = bucket.files
if files.next?
  next_files = files.next
end

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"
files = bucket.files
if files.next?
  next_files = files.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all files by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each file, which is passed as the parameter.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method may make several API calls until all files are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each file by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"
files = bucket.files
files.all do |file|
  puts file.name
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"
files = bucket.files

all_names = files.all.map do |file|
  file.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"
files = bucket.files
files.all(request_limit: 10) do |file|
  puts file.name
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to make
to load all files. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each file.
